title: version 1.8.2: better support for Android TV
message: version 1.8.2: better support for Android TV

title: added watchdog service
message:
added watchdog service

* added CheckRestartSerivice that checks the Bizplay server for the need
to reboot

* since a reboot cannot be performed by 'normal' apps on a non rooted
device the app itself is restarted

* added colaboration between the MainActivity and CheckRestartService on
the base of a binding of the new IserviceCallBacks Interface that is
implemented by the MainActivity. The MainActivity starts the service so
it runs in the same thread and the inter thread communicaton that is
adviced for loosly coupled services is not needed.

* the new service is added to AndroidManifest, an unused service has
been removed from it.

title: fix intent and improved exception handling
message:
fix intent and improved exception handling

* better logging of the exception that occurred

* hand exception to 'real' defailt exception handler

* fixed PendingIntent flag

title: shortened Log tag to fit 23 characters
message:
shortened Log tag to fit 23 characters

made shure the classname variable did not contain a string longer than
23 characters

added two extra logging statements
